name: Kokopoko Creatures
description:
If you're reading this, you've expressed interest in being employed by the greatest scientist of all time: Dr. Zinkus! Please ignore any recent news reports saying she is a "menace to society" or "incapable of joy and empathy!" 

Under her employ, you'll be sent to Kokopoko Island, where an empty monster farm will be waiting for you! As a Monster Farmer, you'll earn Gold, explore the island, and help Dr. Zinkus locate and hatch 6 Divine Eggs from eons past! 

Just make sure you always have enough Gold left over to pay the gigantic Lock Pixie that lives on the door to your home! Otherwise you will shiver alone in the cold. :)

If you're interested in the opportunity of a lifetime, simply reply to this letter with a short essay or a skin sample!

P.S. This game features an incredible soundtrack by p0h_k! Here's a link to check out his music: https://p0hk.com/
